sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: The Music.SoundOff procedure stops any sound or music that is currently playing or is waiting to play.
sections.text_content: The Music.SoundOff procedure stops any sound or music that is currently playing or is waiting to play.
sections.mdown_content: The **Music.SoundOff** procedure stops any sound or music that is currently playing or is waiting to play.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling Music.SoundOff, not by calling SoundOff.
sections.text_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling Music.SoundOff, not by calling SoundOff.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling **Music.SoundOff**, not by calling **SoundOff**.

sections.title: See also
sections.raw_content: Music.Play, Music.PlayFile, and Music.Sound procedures, which make sounds that can be turned off with Music.SoundOff.
sections.text_content: Music.Play, Music.PlayFile, and Music.Sound procedures, which make sounds that can be turned off with Music.SoundOff.
sections.mdown_content: **[music_play.html](Music.Play)**, **[music_playfile.html](Music.PlayFile)**, and **[music_sound.html](Music.Sound)** procedures, which make sounds that can be turned off with **[](Music.SoundOff)**.
